        public static int temperatureUnit(int kelvin,
                                  boolean unit)
        Converts temperature from Kelvin to the unit specified by the boolean.
        Parameters:
        kelvin - temperature in Kelvin
        unit - Celsius if true, Farhenheit if false
        Returns:
        temperature in Farhenheit in the desired unit

      • determineTimezone

        public static java.lang.String determineTimezone(double latti,
                                                 double longi)
        Determines the timezone of this city based on longitude and lattitude. Uses Google's Timezone API. The local timezone is needed in order to properly display (local) sunset/sunrise time.
        Parameters:
        latti - lattitude of location
        longi - longitude of location
        Returns:
        String timezone as per the IANA TZ database

      • readFromURL

        public static java.lang.String readFromURL(java.lang.String url)
        Returns all the String at the given URL. This method is used to fetch the raw JSON String from the supplied URL
        Parameters:
        url - the url from which JSON is to be fetched
        Returns:
        returns all the text on the supplied url webpage

        Converts direction that is in degrees to a one-,two-, or three-letter string compass representation.
        Parameters:
        dir - is wind direction in degrees
        Returns:
        String storing letter representing wind direction
